mapper.select: select count(1) from intf_soc_jixian jixian join intf_soc_itzichan it on jixian.asset_id = it.asset_id where it.dcn_ip = #{ip}

select jixian.item_name,jixian.item_result,jixian.point_name,jixian.point_result,jixian.check_time from intf_soc_jixian jixian join intf_soc_itzichan it on jixian.asset_id = it.asset_id where it.dcn_ip = #{ip} and jixian.point_result = '2' order by jixian.item_name
